name: exponent
posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

dsense.name: exponent
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: a person who supports an idea or belief or performs an activity
trans_examp.trans_cn: （想法或信仰的）拥护者，鼓吹者；（某活动的）能手

example.eg: Adam Smith was an exponent of free trade.
example.egtrans: 亚当‧斯密提倡自由贸易。

example.eg: Jacqueline du Pré was a leading exponent of the cello.
example.egtrans: 杰奎琳•杜普雷是一流的大提琴演奏大师。

dsense.name: exponent
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: a number or sign that shows how many times another number is to be multiplied by itself

example.eg: In 64 and yn, 4 and n are the exponents.
